General.Name: Nyquest Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Nyquest Technology Co., Ltd. research, designs, and sells integrated circuits (ICs). The company provides voice synthesizer ICs, 4-bit microcontrollers with voice/MIDI products, 8-bit microcontrollers, motor drivers, and other products. It offers LED control and drive, speech, and multi-channel speech/melody ICs; 8-Bit OTP MCU for home appliances; 8-bit MCU with LCD drivers; audio amplifier, low power LCD driver IC, high power motor driver ICs, 4-bit MCU with touch-keys and LED controllers, and 4-Bit MCU with universal remote controllers; and 32-bit MCUs. In addition, the company provides hardware and software development tools. It offers its products through agents in Taiwan, Japan, Mainland China, Europe, Hong Kong, and the United States. Nyquest Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 81, Shuili Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30059
